Title: The Cold War
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Amanda Segel, Dan Dietz (story editor), Lucas O'Connor (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Samaritan demonstrates its true power by taking control of New York for 48 hours and erasing crime from the city in an attempt to lure The Machine out of hiding.
